name: Action Swat Sniper (17+) - eXtreme Rivals At War Edition
name_original: Action Swat Sniper (17+) - eXtreme Rivals At War Edition
description:
Get ready for an action packed shooting game set in an urban environment. Terrorists have take over a museum and its up to you to rescue the hostages by taking out all the bad guys. One by one, you shoot your way to victory, but the deeper you get into the building, the greater amount of bullets will be flying towards you. Will you be able to come out victorious?

FEATURES

- Easy one tap shooting controls.
- Cool soundtrack.
- Multiple environments.
